Miscellaneous Highlights: A post-game altercation emerged between Joel Embiid and reporter Marcus Hayes in the locker room.
The incident involved Embiid shoving Hayes during a heated verbal exchange over a recent article in which Hayes was critical of Embiid and mentioned his family.
Others: The NBA is investigating the incident.
Embiid stated he would probably never play back-to-back games the rest of his career.
The situation highlights the challenges athletes face when negotiating their public personas.
